title: Was the father of the man accused of shooting at the training school the keynote speaker at the Obama National Democratic Conference?
subtitle: The extremist party websites published false reports that Imam Siraj and Hagg, the father of New Mexico, suspected of ill-treatment of children, Siraj Ben and Hagg, was the keynote speaker at the 2012 Democratic Conference.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The imam of Siraj and Hajj, the father of a suspect accused of training children to shoot at schools in a compound in New Mexico, was the keynote speaker of the 2012 National Democratic Congress.
